    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static SnappingManager.SnappingOptions create()

      • setAlwaysSnap

        public final void setAlwaysSnap(boolean alwaysSnap)
        Set the alwaysSnap parameter.
        Parameters:
        alwaysSnap - - When true, snapping is always enabled. When false users press the snapKey to enable snapping. Default value is false.

      • setLayerInfos

        public final void setLayerInfos(SnappingManager.LayerInfos[] layerInfos)
        Set the layerInfos parameter.
        Parameters:
        layerInfos - - An array of layerInfo objects that define the snapping target layers. All values are optional. If no snapping options are set the default values will be used.

      • setMap

        public final void setMap(MapWidget map)
        Set the map parameter.
        Parameters:
        map - - Reference to the map. Required parameter.

      • setSnapKey

        public final void setSnapKey(int key)
        Set the snapKey parameter.
        Parameters:
        - - When alwaysSnap is set to false use this option to define the key users press to enable snapping. The default values is the CTRL key.

      • setSnapPointSymbol

        public final void setSnapPointSymbol(SimpleMarkerSymbol snapPointSymbol)
        Set the snapPointSymbol parameter.
        Parameters:
        snapPointSymbol - - Define a symbol for the snapping location. The default symbol is a simple marker symbol with the following properties: size:15px,color:cyan, style:STYLE_CROSS.

      • setTolerance

        public final void setTolerance(int tolerance)
        Set the tolerance parameter.
        Parameters:
        tolerance - - Specify the radius of the snapping circle in pixels. The default value is 15 pixels.
